short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all the fonts you run into in your fontcase!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Font Case tracks the fonts used in every webpage you visit. It works completely autonomously. You surf the internet as usual, and all the webpages you visit and the fonts you've seen will be saved in your Font Case.

Absolutely no data is sent anywhere. The data remains entirely local on your computer.
